response.original_title: Khamaru (കമറു) | Obscura Production | Malayalam Documentary | Cochin Kamarudheen | Cycle Yajnam
response.overview: "KHAMARU" is a  documentary about cochin Kamarudheen, a kochi -based artist and performer. It follows his journey from being a junior artist in films to becoming a cycle yajnam performer in street circuses across Kerala. The film  captures his life in north paravur and visits to kochi , where he reflects on his past experiences.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SpU9UMHHWes
response.tagline: Khamaru (കമറു) | Obscura Production | Malayalam Documentary | Cochin Kamarudheen | Cycle Yajnam |
response.title: Khamaru (കമറു) | Obscura Production | Malayalam Documentary | Cochin Kamarudheen | Cycle Yajnam
